short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increase productivity by blocking distracting websites during productive sessions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reduce procrastination and improve productivity using ProductivePulse. Set up Productive Sessions with timers and block selected distracting websites with Productive Mode. No personal or sensitive user data is collected. Only the current website host is checked when blocking websites.
